title: Amine-crosslinked lignin for water pollution attributable to organic dye remediation: Versatile adsorbent for selective dye removal and reusability
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Do Hun Oh, Ji Won Heo, Qian Xia, Min Soo Kim, Yong Sik Kim
